title: Reverse Engineering Poly TC8
shortDescription: In this project, I took a deep dive into embedded linux, Android debugging tools, hardware reverse engineering, producing custom Linux images for embedded hardware.

title: Spencer BMP
shortDescription: Spencer BMP is a custom BMP parser written in C. The purpose of this project was to get a deeper understanding of file specifications and how they are actually stored and created. This brick image was actually generated from scratch with this BMP library =D
